import React from 'react'; import {useState} from 'react'; import "./Header.css"; const Header = () => { window.addEventListener("scroll", function () { const header = document.querySelector(".header"); if (this.screenY >= 80) header.classList.add("scroll-header"); else header.classList.remove("scroll-header"); }); const[Toggle, showMenu]=useState(false); return (
